moved: The page you are looking for was moved, removed, renamed or might never have existed.
confirm-current-password: Confirm your current password to get started.
profile-page-desc: Here you can edit your personal details.
password-page-desc: Here you can update your password.
early-plan-monthly-desc: The early adopter plan. Everything we build in the first year. Fixed price forever.
early-plan-yearly-desc: The early adopter plan. Everything we build in the first year. Fixed price forever. Billed yearly.
add-signers-desc: Add the people who will sign the document.
name: Name
add-subject-desc: Add the subject and message you wish to send to signers.
subject: Subject (Optional)
title: Title
add-fields-desc: Add all relevant fields for each recipient.
doc-send-error: An error occurred while sending the document.
doc-sign-error: An error occurred while signing the document.
document-sent-mess: Your document has been sent successfully.
you-can-use: You can use the following variables in your message:
empty-caption: You have not yet created or received any documents. To create a document please upload one.
welcome-back: Welcome back, we are lucky to have you.
create-account: Create your account and start using state-of-the-art document signing. Open and beautiful. signing is within your grasp.
setup-2fa-desc: Use an authenticator app or browser extension to scan the qr code.
setup-2fa-card-desc: Unable to scan? You can use the setup key to manually configure your authenticator app.
in-case: In case you lose access to your device and are unable to receive two-factor authentication codes, recovery codes provide a means to access your account.
create-one-time-password: Create one-time passwords that serve as a secondary authentication method for confirming your identity when requested during the sign-in process.
we-encountered-an-unknown-error: We encountered an unknown error while attempting to sign you In. Please try again later.
2fa-auth-enabled: Two-factor authentication enabled. Please enter the six-digit code from your authenticator app.
enter-6-digits: Two-factor authentication enabled. Please enter the six-digit code from your authenticator app.
backup-copied-to-clipboard: Your backup codes has been copied to your clipboard.
